SEARCH
Package com.safetynet.safetynet_alert.service

Class FireStationService

java.lang.Object
com.safetynet.safetynet_alert.service.FireStationService
@Service public class FireStationService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing fire station operations including creating, updating, deleting fire stations, retrieving people covered by a fire station, and other related functionalities.

    Constructs a FireStationService with the given DataRepository.

    • createFireStation

      public void createFireStation(FireStation fireStation)
      Creates a new fire station-address mapping.
      Parameters:
      fireStation - the FireStation object containing the mapping details
      Throws:
      AlreadyExistsException - if the mapping for the given address already exists

    • updateFireStation

      public void updateFireStation(FireStation fireStation)
      Updates an existing fire station-address mapping.
      Parameters:
      fireStation - the FireStation object containing the updated mapping details
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no mapping for the given address exists

    • deleteFireStation

      public void deleteFireStation(String address)
      Deletes the fire station-address mapping for the given address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to remove the mapping for
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no mapping for the given address exists

    • deleteFireStation

      public void deleteFireStation(int stationNumber)
      Deletes the fire station-address mapping for the given station number.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - the station number to remove the mapping for
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no mapping for the given station number exists

    • getPersonsByStation

      public FireStationResponse getPersonsByStation(int stationNumber) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Retrieves the list of persons covered by a fire station, based on the station number.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - the station number for which the people should be retrieved
      Returns:
      a FireStationResponse containing the people covered by the station
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException - if an error occurs while reading the data
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException - if an error occurs while binding the data
      IOException - if an error occurs during input/output operations

    • getPhoneNumbersByStation

      public Set<String> getPhoneNumbersByStation(int stationNumber)
      Retrieves the phone numbers of all people covered by a fire station.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - the station number for which the phone numbers should be retrieved
      Returns:
      a set of phone numbers of people covered by the station

    • getAdressesByStation

      public Set<String> getAdressesByStation(int stationNumber)
      Retrieves the addresses of all people covered by a fire station, based on the station number.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - the station number for which the addresses should be retrieved
      Returns:
      a set of addresses of people covered by the station

    • getStationByAddress

      public int getStationByAddress(String address)
      Retrieves the station number for a given address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address for which the station number should be retrieved
      Returns:
      the station number that covers the given address
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no station exists for the given address

    • getChildrenByAdress

      public ChildAlertResponse getChildrenByAdress(String address)
      Retrieves a list of children living at a given address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to check for children
      Returns:
      a ChildAlertResponse containing children and other people living at the address

    • getPersonSetByAddress

      address - the address to check for persons
      Returns:

    • getPersonsByAddress

      public FireResponse getPersonsByAddress(String address)
      Retrieves the list of persons living at a given address, along with the fire station information.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to retrieve persons from
      Returns:
      a FireResponse containing persons at the address and their fire station

    • getHomesByStations

      public List<FloodDTO> getHomesByStations(List<Integer> stationNumbers)
      Retrieves the list of homes covered by multiple stations.
      Parameters:
      stationNumbers - a list of station numbers to retrieve homes for
      Returns:
      a list of FloodDTO containing homes covered by each station

      Checks if an address is already mapped to a fire station.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to check
      Returns:
      true if the address is already mapped, false otherwise
